Category-I: Merit Based Scholarship - Awarded based on academic excellence and high performance in previous studies.
Category-II: Performance Based Award - Given for exceptional performance in specific fields or disciplines.
Category-III: Defence Based Subsidy - Offered to individuals with connections to the defence sector.
Category-IV: Garrisonian & Kinship Based Scholarship - For students related to current or former members of the Garrison community.
Category-V: LGU Employees Scholarship - Available for employees of Lahore Garrison University and their families.
Category-VI: Sports Based Scholarship - Awarded to students with outstanding achievements in sports.
Category-VII: Need Based Scholarship - Provided to students who demonstrate financial need.
